DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , single center , open randomize , six way crossover study compare dose response effect four different dos Technosphere Insulin pulmonary function delivery comparison s.c. injection two different dos regular human insulin .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effect Glucose Infusion Rates Between Inhaled Technosphere Insulin Subcutaneous Injection Regular Human Insulin
DOC.criteria: Subjects must good health , judge brief history physical examination . Sex : , male female . Age : 1840 year . Body mass index : 1827 kg/m2 . Capability reach peak inspiratory flow > 41/sec measure computer assist spirometry . FEV1 equal great 80 % predict normal . Diabetes Mellitus type 1 type 2 . Human insulin antibody . Anamnestic history hypersensitivity study medication drug similar chemical structure . Having history severe multiple allergy . Treatment investigational drug last three month study entry . Progressive fatal disease . History significant cardiovascular , respiratory , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , neurological , psychiatric /or hematological disease . Having ongoing respiratory tract infection . Smoker define subject evidence history tobacco nicotine use last year prior entry study . Blood donation within last 30 day . A woman lactate . Pregnant woman woman intend become pregnant study . A sexually active woman childbearing age actively practice birth control use medically accept device therapy . A lack compliance reason , prevent opinion investigator participation subject study .
